snippet: Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater, which has wrapped up its first season under new artistic director, Robert Battle, delivers hits but should also present more challenging pieces.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay Critic's Notebook discusses Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater's first season under its new artistic director Robert Battle.
lead_paragraph: Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater, which has wrapped up its first season under new artistic director, Robert Battle, delivers hits but should also present more challenging pieces.

headline.seo: Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater as Hit Maker
headline.main: Trying Always to Please, Rarely to Challenge
headline.print_headline: Trying Always to Please, Rarely to Challenge
